title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Patient Engagement-Based Nursing Education Design: Service User-Driven

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three empathetic communication strategies based on patient experiences

Based on 1:1 consultation records with patients and caregivers, learners can apply the 5-step patient-centered nursing care planning guidelines (assessment-diagnosis-planning-implementation-evaluation) to develop nursing care plans for three actual cases and achieve an average score of 3 or higher on a 4-point scale evaluation criteria (1=Poor, 4=Excellent) from a practice supervisor.
Learners write self-reflection reports based on patient feedback to suggest directions for improving nursing practice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
